about_the_game:
Dive Hard Dave is an atmospheric action-adventure stealth game - set in a post-apocalyptic distant future world that is shattered by a massive tsunami and rise in sea levels. Most of Earth's continents are now underwater. The remaining humans live on pockets of land that are now controlled by rich military Corporations, wealthy businessmen, and savage pirates. This game is created by a Solo developer.

You are Dave, a freelance diver & owner of the 'Dive Hard Marine Services'. Your adventure begins when you are forced to take up a diving job and unknowingly set on a mission that will unravel mysteries hidden deep beneath the waters and possibly find answers to what happened to Earth a century ago.

FEATURES

  • Embark on an adventure through this atmospheric post-apocalyptic 2.5D cinematic side-scroller

  • Experience the main story to unravel mysteries of Earth's past

  • Traverse through diverse locations - dangerous islands, submerged cities, dark underwater caves, fortified enemy bases, and more

  • Shoot your way through the enemies or Sneak up behind them without being detected

  • Help troubled citizens, take up side quests, make a difference in this ruined world

  • Engage with NPCs in multi-branched dialogues to extract information, learn more about your mission
